text: Norma is a popular girl's name. Norma may also several other things: In science and technology: * Norma (constellation), a group of stars in the southern sky * Cygnus Arm, also known as the Norma Arm, a spiral arm in the Milky Way galaxy * 555 Norma, a minor planet Places: * Norma (LT), a city in the province of Latina, Italy * Norma, Tibet * Normafa (lit. "Norma tree"), a popular tourist destination in Budapest, Hungary In entertainment: * Norma, an opera by Vincenzo Bellini * Norma, a play by Henrik Ibsen * Norma, a novel by Vladimir Sorokin Tropical systems: * Tropical Storm Norma (1970) * Hurricane Norma (1974) * Hurricane Norma (1981) * Hurricane Norma (1987) * Tropical Storm Norma (1993) * Tropical Storm Norma (2005) Other uses: * Norma (company), a Swedish ammunition manufacturer * Norma (supermarket), a food discount store chain found in Europe
title: Norma
